title: Education and Youth Development
vision: All youth will be at grade level in reading and math, complete an education that prepares them for success in college and career, and grow up supported by caring adults

targets.name: Graduation
targets.content: Increase the high school graduation rate from 76% to 85%

targets.name: Grade-level achievement
targets.content: Increase percentage of 3rd graders at grade level in reading and math to 50%

targets.name: Caring adults
targets.content: Increase the percentage of youth with a caring person other than their parent to 90%

definitions.definition: Graduation rate is the share of students from a given class who graduate high school within four years. Figures shown are for public school districts.
